patthana18.2:1.1: Hetuṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana18.2:2.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe pañca, vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca. (Sahetukasadisaṃ.)
patthana18.2:3.1: Hetuṃ hetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana18.2:4.1: Nahetuṃ hetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana18.2:5.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cattāri.
